item.description: Weather permitting, meet in the Mt. Cardigan State Park parking lot at 4pm. Hike to the top and back. I can hike it up in about 45 minutes, but let's allow an hour or a bit longer. Stay at the top for 20 minutes or so, and hike back down. Should take around 2-2.5 hours. A nice beginner level hike. 1.5 miles. 1200 feet of gain. More details at http://www.nhstatepar... Rains cancels.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Hike Mt Cardigan (west side approach)
